sentences.sContent: Grint added that he would "definitely" like to be part of the sixth and seventh films.
sentences.sContent_eng: Grint added that he would "definitely" like to be part of the sixth and seventh films.
sentences.sCn: 格林特还补充说他肯定还会参加第六和第七部哈�波特电影的拍摄。

sentences.sContent: Both will meet in your seventh house of partnerships, so to unlock your good fortune, you need to collaborate with a partner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both will meet in your seventh house of partnerships, so to unlock your good fortune, you need to collaborate with a partner.
sentences.sCn: 它们将在你表合作关系的第七宫会面，如果你有一个合作伙伴的话，它们将合作释放出你的好运气。

sentences.sContent: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.sCn: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

words.tran: 第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的
第七十的；七十分之一的

trans.tranOther: one of seven equal parts of something
